name: obs-properties-dock
description: Dockable source properties and scene item transform
long_description:
Gives you a dockable Properties and Transform window, so that you can have both the properties and the preview on the same screen easily.

You can find these Docks in the "Docks" menu.

name: obs-vision-filter
long_description:
Take advantage of Apple's ML Engine and easily remove the background of your video without a greenscreen or burning your CPU.

After installation, add the filter to any source you wish under "Effect Filters".

This plugin requires macOS 12.0 or newer.

name: obs-scene-template
description: Yet another solution for a problem that's already solved.
long_description: Create a reusable, but modifyable scene. Basically the best out of the two worlds of nesting scenes and copying sources.
